item.title: VPS to a coloed server, my homelab journey - Part 1
item.author: Guy Evans
item.description: As a young child I always had an interest in computers and tech, little did I know that it would foundation for my carear path that I have chosen today. So where I am retracing my steps of how I ended up with a server colocated in a datacenter that made me the sys and net admin I am today How I Started Age 12 - I had built my own website (but thats a story for another post.
